title: 02/11/22 DPS Hour 1 Chris Mannix
itunes:title: 02/11/22 DPS Hour 1 Chris Mannix
description:
Sports Illustrated NBA Insider Chris Mannix joins The Dan Patrick Show to talk about the Nets dealing James Harden to the Sixers, explaining why they couldn't afford to wait until the offseason to do it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
